nodes.text: White Wampa Ale was a type of ale served at Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY. During that year, the Batuuan local Dotti snorted it out of her nose as she scoffed at Resistance spy Vi Moradi's attempts to build support. Eloc Throno considered it one of his favorite beverages and thought that it was very smooth and refreshing on warm days. The drink was suitable for human consumption.

White Wampa Ale is hefeweizen-style wheat beer available to customers at the Oga's Cantina bar in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge upon the opening of the theme park in 2019. It was revealed as part of a large promotional event held on February 26, 2019.
White Wampa Ale is brewed by Ballast Point Brewing Company. It is 4.5% alcohol by volume, and its menu description reads, "Classic Hefeweizen with a Banana and Citrus Character."
